help-file.title: "HELLFIRE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Caster Aggressive: No Cumulative: n/a Duration: Dependant on level of caster Type of spell: Protection
"Hellfire" opens a channel from the bowels of hell unto the antipaladin himself. Imbued with the power of pure hellborne fire, the antipaladin not only has a more acute vampiric touch, but his touch extends through to the tip of his weapon. In other words, he can vamp while wielding and the vamp is based only on the dice of that weapon.
